ViewObject.Name: cypVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_date(to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy'),'mm/yyyy') between to_date(:fm ||'/'||:fy,'mm/yyyy') and to_date(:tm||'/'||:ty,'mm/yyyy') and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3
and p.prod_id=:prod and 'u' = :dateType and '0' <> :type
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'mm')= :m and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3 and '0' <> :type and p.prod_id=:prod and 'mon' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q')= :q
and '0' <> :type and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'qua' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('1','2') and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 1 = :h and '0' <> :type and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3 group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy')
union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id, to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('3','4') and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 2 = :h and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3 and '0' <> :type group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y
and p.prod_id=:prod and 'ann' = :dateType and '0' <> :type and F.SUP_CODE in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null ) AND (select distinct type_hierarchy from fac_type ft, facility ff where ft.fac_type_id = ff.fac_type_id and ff.facility_id = :firstFacility ) <> 3 group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy')
UNION --/////////////// NOT alL ///////////// select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_date(to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy'),'mm/yyyy') between to_date(:fm ||'/'||:fy,'mm/yyyy') and to_date(:tm||'/'||:ty,'mm/yyyy') and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'u' = :dateType and '0' <> :type
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'mm')= :m and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
and '0' <> :type and p.prod_id=:prod and 'mon' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q')= :q and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and '0' <> :type and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
and p.prod_id=:prod and 'qua' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('1','2') and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 1 = :h and '0' <> :type and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id, to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('3','4') and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 2 = :h and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
and '0' <> :type group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'ann' = :dateType and '0' <> :type and cm.facility_id in ( select regexp_substr (:fac, '[^,]+',1,level) from dual connect by regexp_substr (:fac,'[^,]+',1,level) is not null )
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy')
union
------------------------- ------------------------------- -------------- All ------------ ----------------------------- select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_date(to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy'),'mm/yyyy') between to_date(:fm ||'/'||:fy,'mm/yyyy') and to_date(:tm||'/'||:ty,'mm/yyyy')
and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'u' = :dateType and '0' = :type
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'mm')= :m and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and '0' = :type and p.prod_id=:prod and 'mon' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q')= :q and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and 0 = :type and p.prod_id=:prod and 'qua' = :dateType
group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union
select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('1','2') and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 1 = :h and '0' = :type group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and to_char(cm.p_date,'Q') in ('3','4') and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'hy' = :dateType and 2 = :h
and '0' = :type group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') union select ( case when p.prod_id not in (3,7,12) then round(sum(ci.issues / p.prod_cyp) ) else round(sum(ci.issues * p.prod_cyp) ) end ) cyp, p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') pdate from ctf_item ci, ctf_main cm, facility f, fac_type ft,product p where ci.prod_id = p.prod_id(+) and ci.ctf_main_id = cm.ctf_main_id(+) and cm.facility_id = f.facility_id and f.fac_type_id= ft.fac_type_id(+) and to_char(cm.p_date,'yyyy')=:y and ft.type_hierarchy=3 and p.prod_id=:prod and 'ann' = :dateType and '0' = :type group by p.prod_id,to_char(cm.p_date,'mm/yyyy') order by 3
